name: nvablo

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, cablo), wcel(cfv(c1st, c0), cvc))
stmt.pretty: syl(c0 ∈ NrmCVec, c1 ∈ AbelOp, (1st ` c0)∈ CVecOLD)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, cablo))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(cfv(c1st, c0), cvc))
-| wi(wcel(cfv(c1st, c0), cvc), wcel(c1, cablo))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ NrmCVec → c1 ∈ AbelOp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ NrmCVec →(1st ` c0)∈ CVecOLD)
⊣ ((1st ` c0)∈ CVecOLD → c1 ∈ AbelOp)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, cablo))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(cfv(c1st, c0), cvc))
-| wi(wcel(cfv(c1st, c0), cvc), wcel(c1, cablo))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ NrmCVec → c1 ∈ AbelOp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ NrmCVec →(1st ` c0)∈ CVecOLD)
⊣ ((1st ` c0)∈ CVecOLD → c1 ∈ AbelOp)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(cfv(c1st, c0), cvc))
-| wceq(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c1st, c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, cablo))
-| wi(wcel(cfv(c1st, c0), cvc), wcel(c1, cablo))
-| wceq(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c1st, c0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ NrmCVec → c1 ∈ AbelOp)
⊣ ((1st ` c0)∈ CVecOLD → c1 ∈ AbelOp)
⊣ (1st ` c0)=(1st ` c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, cablo))
-| wi(wcel(cfv(c1st, c0), cvc), wcel(c1, cablo))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ NrmCVec → c1 ∈ AbelOp)
⊣ ((1st ` c0)∈ CVecOLD → c1 ∈ AbelOp)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(cfv(c1st, c0), cvc), wcel(c1, cablo))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(c1st, cfv(c1st, c0)))
body.pretty:
⊢ ((1st ` c0)∈ CVecOLD → c1 ∈ AbelOp)
⊣ c1 =(1st `(1st ` c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, cablo))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(c1st, cfv(c1st, c0)))

body.origin:
|- wceq(c1, cfv(c1st, cfv(c1st, c0)))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cpv, c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, cablo))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cpv, c0))

comment: The vector addition operation of a normed complex vector space is an Abelian group. (Contributed by NM, 15-Feb-2008.) (New usage is discouraged.)
